TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DependencyInjectionMethodParameterBinding extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.DependencyInjectionParameterBinding

Docs.summary: Describes the binding from a method on an EF internal dependency injection service, which may or may not also have and associated , to a parameter in a constructor, factory method, or similar.
Docs.remarks: See Entity types with constructors for more information and examples.
